body.name: Grit and Gunpowder: A Historical Western Adventure Novel
body.description: Bella Folino, a fiery and celebrated actress, finds herself stranded en route to a California mountain boomtown. Abandoned by her theater company, she enlists two ingenious hoboes, determined to stage her plays. Unbeknownst to her, their destination is a town rife with conflict over the Great Vein, a legendary silver deposit…Fate has plans other than art…Hank Maloney, unwavering and steadfast, anchors himself firmly to his rightful claim of the Great Vein amidst Silverville's mining conflicts. His unwavering integrity shines like a beacon in the shadowy depths of greed and rivalry. Facing off against a fierce rival hungry for the vein's riches, Hank's resolute spirit and unshakable resolve mark him as a central figure in the town's volatile showdown…Can he stand his ground in a world gone insane?In the midst of this, Bella's theatrical flair intertwines with Hank's world, injecting a spark of the unexpected into Silverville's gritty history. Will they succeed in saving everyone from a greedy takeover plan? Their paths cross and set the stage for a tale brimming with adventure, intrigue, and the unyielding pursuit of dreams against all odds!"Grit and Gunpowder" is a historical adventure novel of approximately 60,000 words. No cliffhangers, only pure unadulterated action. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Treachery and Romance in an Old West mining town.
reviews.reviewText: Bella is an actress who, after being stranded when her company abandons her, arrives in the mining town of Silverville, CA with 2 drifters she met on the road to do shows for the miners and hopefully earn enough money to get back to San Francisco. She meets Hank Maloney a local mine owner and immediately there is an attraction. However, the unscrupulous John Krukshank has started a war with Maloney in an attempt to force him out of town so he can take over Maloney’s claims. As Bella gets closer to Hank, she is drawn into the conflict and must find a way to save herself from a murderer. Fans of this author will be familiar with his style which is evident in this book. There is plenty of action, adventure, conflict, romance, and a little religion as well. Ethan Westfield is a very good storyteller; the story flows so well, and was so good, it kept my attention and I found it hard to put down; I finished it very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Makes me think of some of the mining towns years ago.It was a hard way to make a living.It seemed as though the writer had knowledge of those days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is another of Mr. Westfield stories that bring the old West into your hands and makes you live it. The trouble that people had to go through to make a life in that time was hard and there was plenty of bad men that tried to take advantage of the weaker ones. This time the good people came out on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Story Around Danger
reviews.reviewText: A good women and good man work together to fight a criminal. The miners from each completing company are driven by a good man and man driven by lust and greed. But good wins out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An interesting story
reviews.reviewText: This was an interesting story that has an interesting heroine and hero as they find their way to be together! I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed reading this novel it's got a great storyline great characters very well written page turner great novel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ethan Westfield writes the way i like to read

reviews.reviewTitle: Two mining companies — and one is determined to take over the other
reviews.reviewText: He tries to buy it. He tries to take over. And he even resorts to murder. And then he kidnaps the woman the man loves. But the man who takes her does so in secret. Seriously an amazing book!!! Absolutely loved it!!!!
